title: American Arlines using Sophisto for their magazine???
content:
I've been told from a colleague that Sophisto (Psy/Ops) [http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_sophisto\_ss.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140404183316/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_sophisto_ss.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_sophisto\_ss.html") is used as part of the layout in a magazine for American Airlines. Probably the one onboard the planes. Could anyone else confirm this? Have anyone else seen it lately? I would be most eager to lay my hands on a copy. Any further info on this is helpful. TIA. ;-)

Cheers
author: Stefan H

comments.content:
Well it seems I was fast enough to answer this question myself...

American Airline have a magazine called NEXOS, which is the onboard magazine for all their Spanish speaking destinations (mainly Latin America and Central America). Coes out six times a year, in about 236.000 copies each time... so it can't be to bad to have Sophisto featured could it?! :-)

[http://nexosmag.com/Default.aspx?tabid=193](http://web.archive.org/web/20140404183316/http:/nexosmag.com/Default.aspx?tabid=193 "http://nexosmag.com/Default.aspx?tabid=193")

Any additional info could come handy though, TIA.
